compat-change.description: {@link MediaSession#setMediaButtonBroadcastReceiver(ComponentName)} throws an {@link IllegalArgumentException} if the provided {@link ComponentName} does not resolve to a valid {@link android.content.BroadcastReceiver broadcast receiver} for apps targeting Android U and above. For apps targeting Android T and below, the request will be ignored.
compat-change.name: THROW_FOR_INVALID_BROADCAST_RECEIVER
